text:
Hi, I'm new to HubSpot CMS.
For a developer, I'm more comfortable using local development rather than design manager. But what are the real advantages of this one?
Possibility to use SASS?
Possibility to use js frameworks ( React, Angular, Vue ) ?
Optimization of the site ( Speed Insight ) compared to the Design Manager thanks to Webpack for example ?
That's it, many questions. Thank you in advance.
hopefully this gif answered all of your questions

Hi, I'm new to HubSpot, I want to create a paid app and I couldn't find any documents.
Can someone please help me with that?
Hi Gomzy, this guide will step you through what is needed to create a paid app for the HubSpot marketplace: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/>
Hey <@UA5DFM7CK> :woman-raising-hand: have anyway to insert a not flat background on number count up module for Clear6?
Hey <@UV0H98LBB>. I’m not sure what you mean. Shoot me a DM. I’ll be back in the office in an hour or so and we can chat. Super easy customization if I understand what I think you’re asking.
Thanks a lot Kevin, I will ping you for sure. Thankssss
